title: AC Milan 'targeting unhappy midfield stars' with Modric, Vidal and Rakitic all on the radar
text:
AC Milan are reportedly planning to turn their poor form around by signing 'unhappy midfielders' with Luka Modric, Arturo Vidal and Ivan Rakitic three players on the club's radar.

Stefano Pioli arrived to take charge from Marco Giampaolo recently but has yet to win with a draw and defeat from his opening two games.

In a bid to improve the side, Gazzetta dello Sport report that Milan are searching for bargains in the transfer market and are looking to players that may be deemed surplus to requirements in Spain.

Luka Modric (left) and Arturo Vidal (right) are reported to be on the radar of AC Milan

Ivan Rakitic has been widely reported to be of interest to clubs in Italy, including both in Milan

The 18-time Serie A winners are in the shadows of city rivals Inter and are aware they need to turn it around soon if they are to close the gap on those in the Champions League places.

Milan have focused on restructuring the club around young talents such as Krzysztof Piatek, Rafael Leao and Lucas Paqueta, there was an acknowledgement from CEO Ivan Gazidis recently that Pioli's side may need some experienced heads to guide the young core.

Rakitic has been strongly linked with an exit from Barcelona for some time and while he is under contract until 2021, the 31-year-old is widely expected to seek a new challenge when the transfer window re-opens in January.

Gazzetta dello Sport's front cover on Wednesday ran with the story about Milan's bargain hunt

'I will do everything I can to help this club back on the right path,' Gazidis told Gazzetta dello Sport this week.

'I'm convinced we will achieve our objectives if we work together in the difficult moments.

'Right now, we have the youngest team in Serie A, but this doesn't mean that we won't invest in players with experience to guide the younger ones.'

Pioli's side are slumped in 13th, with three wins from their opening nine games ahead of Thursday's meeting with struggling SPAL at the San Siro.
description: AC Milan are reportedly planning to turn their poor form around by signing 'unhappy midfielders' with Luka Modric, Arturo Vidal and Ivan Rakitic three players on the club's radar.
